name: Caius Julius Caesar
reign: October 49 BC –, 15 March 44 BC (as dictator and/or consul)
consort: Cornelia Cinna minor 84–68 BC , Pompeia 68–63 BC , Calpurnia Pisonis 59–44 BC
issue: Julia Caesaris 85/84–54 BC, Caesarion 47–30 BC, Augustus 63 BC–AD 14 (grand-nephew, posthumously adopted as Caesar's son in 44 BC)  |royal house =Julio-Claudian
